title: 'This is big': Shooting survivors on a road trip for change
text:
'This is big': Shooting survivors on a road trip for change 5:16am EST - 01:47 
Dozens of students and parents from the Florida high school where 17 teens and staff members died in a shooting rampage boarded buses on Tuesday for a trip to the state capital Tallahassee to push for a ban on assault rifles.   
Dozens of students and parents from the Florida high school where 17 teens and staff members died in a shooting rampage boarded buses on Tuesday for a trip to the state capital Tallahassee to push for a ban on assault rifles.  //reut.rs/2EX6RXK
